title: Which medical college is better: GMC Bhopal or MGMMC Indore? - Quora
tags: Bachelor of Medicine and Bachelor of Surgery Degrees

response.answer_text: It looks like choosing between a sandwich and a burger, it all depends on your needs and mood. So I’m comparing both the colleges on some major fronts:- Location: MGMMC is based in a busy urban position in the heart of the city of Indore while GMC is blessed with a serene background of the majestic upper lake to its south and a busy suburb to its north. G.M.C, Bhopal as from it’s North entrance (Aerial View)  MGMMC, Indore as from it’s front entrance Associated Hospitals: Both the colleges are undergoing a major overhaul to undertake the massive development around the medical world to be incorporated in the present scenario. MGMMC currently hosts the largest hospital in terms of bed size but GMC hosts the highest OPD attendance. They both have their own pros and cons. Former entrance to the Hamidia Hospital  Entrance to the Maharaja Yashwantrao Hospital, Indore Residential Facilities: While I’m not sure about MGMMC, the accommodation facilities in GMC are far more than adequate, with the new hostel blocks coming up, you can soon expect a lot more than what a normal govt college has to offer. Overall, under the current scenario, GMC has adequate accommodating potential for its upcoming students.Student life: It’s the only thing that binds us on the same thread. Both the colleges offer a simple life of any ordinary student and a dynamic hectic schedule of a medico. (No House MD feelings though, sorry to let you down!) Welcome to the 6 circles of Hell!!XD Academia: Both are excellent colleges when it comes to academics. Academically, both the colleges have their pros and cons much like the rest of the colleges in this country. No more words required XD!!! Even these books are less than what it takes to clear the internal exams… Outside College life: Yes! This can be a quite distinctive point. Wanna live in a place of hustle and bustle? Can deal with the concrete jungle? Wanna have a bustling backdrop of metro city? Welcome to MGMMC, Indore but if you prefer a naturally blessed, picturesque morning everyday and a calm notion without the commercial city tag; Welcome to GMC, Bhopal. A late evening view of the Upper lake, Bhopal.  The upcoming commercial hub of Vijay Nagar, Indore. P.S: I completely respect both the institutions. I’ve been in contact with both of them, but if you think that I’m biased towards one of them, please present your errands in the comment section below and further edits and facts are always welcome.

Both are government colleges hence nearly the same.Teachers,  both place we have good professors. Campus, nearly the same.Patients,  all gov hospitals have a lot of patients,  full opds. Hostel n canteen available.  Regarding city,  bhopal is city a lakes, who will have a lot of placesfor recreation. Peaceful city Indore, on the other hand, full of delicacies, mouth watering dishes, on every corner you'll find some place to eat. Quite a rush city. So depending on your comfort select the colg if you have options of both.
